CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Krow__Tax_Type__c, 'VAT')), ((( Krow__Additional_Amount_Total__c - (Krow__Additional_Amount_Total__c * Krow__Discount__c)) * Krow__Tax_2__c ) + ( (Krow__Fixed_Fee_Amount__c - (Krow__Fixed_Fee_Amount__c * Krow__Discount__c)) * Krow__Tax_2__c) + ( (Krow__Invoice_Amount__c - (Krow__Invoice_Amount__c * Krow__Discount__c )) * Krow__Tax_2__c)+ ( (Krow__Expense_Amount__c - (Krow__Expense_Amount__c * Krow__Discount__c )) * Krow__Tax_2__c)), 0)
CustomField.label: Total Tax 2 Amount
